body:
Hey guys want your clip in a video?
OK if so this will be a stunt video it will be a top 5 stunts to start off with.
It does not matter what game it is just has to go on you-tube.
When you have your awesome stunt and u want to try get in.
Email me here : mattyptatty01@outlook.com
And tell me the name of your mine craft user and your email and the link to your video.
Good Luck!
Tell me what u think.
Matt.
